description: Enterprise techniques used by Nidiran, ATT&CK software S0118 v1.1
name: Nidiran (S0118)

techniques.comment: Nidiran can create a new service named msamger (Microsoft Security Accounts Manager).[2]
Nidiran can download and execute files.[2]
Nidiran can create a new service named msamger (Microsoft Security Accounts Manager), which mimics the legitimate Microsoft database by the same name.[2][3]
